modifier1.name: Bashing
modifier1.desc: Deals double damage when gun bashing

modifier1.name: Berserker
modifier1.desc: Does more damage the less armor one has

modifier1.name: Furious
modifier1.desc: Each consecutive hit deals more damage

modifier1.name: Instigating
modifier1.desc: deals double damage to targets with full health

modifier1.name: Oxygenated
modifier1.desc: Hold-breath time when aiming using a scoped weapons is increased

modifier1.name: SpaceAdept
modifier1.desc: 30% damage while in space, and -15% damage while on a planet

modifier2.name: Corrosive
modifier2.desc: Randomly deals corrosive damage and reduces the targets' armor over 6 seconds

modifier2.name: Crippling
modifier2.desc: Deals +30% damage on the next attack after hitting a target's limbs

modifier2.name: Handloading
modifier2.desc: Volatile rounds that are designed to pack a bigger punch, but aren't as stable and can fail on occasion

modifier2.name: Lacerate
modifier2.desc: Randomly applies a bleed effect to the target

modifier2.name: MedTheft
modifier2.desc: Chance that humans drop extra Med Packs on death

modifier2.name: Poison
modifier2.desc: Randomly deals poison damage and slows the target

modifier2.name: Radioactive
modifier2.desc: Randomly deals radioactive damage and demoralizes the target

modifier3.name: Concussive
modifier3.desc: Small chance to knock down targets

modifier3.name: Elemental
modifier3.desc: Randomly deals Corrosive, Radiation, Poison and Incendiary damage

modifier3.name: Frenzy
modifier3.desc: Small chance to frenzy a target

modifier3.name: OneInchPunch
modifier3.desc: Rounds fire in a shotgun-like spread

modifier3.name: Skipshot
modifier3.desc: Every fourth shot fires two projectiles at once

modifier3.name: Tesla
modifier3.desc: Rounds will sometimes emit electricity where they land that damages and slows nearby targets

modifier3.name: Titanium Build
modifier3.desc: Premium build materials make this weapon light as a feather
